description: Today's links America and "national capitalism": How the EU should respond to Trumpism. Hey look at this: Delights to delectate. Object permanence: 2005, 2010, 2015 Upcoming appearances: Where to find me. Recent appearances: Where I've been. Latest books: You keep readin' em, I'll keep writin' 'em. Upcoming books: Like I said, I'll keep writin' 'em. Colophon: All the rest. America and "national capitalism" (permalink) Thomas Piketty's 2013 unexpected bestseller (a 750 page economics book translated from French!) Capital in the 21st Century, offers a very convincing explanation of our political decay, and it continues to serve this purpose as the decay undergoes alarming acceleration: https://memex.craphound.com/2014/06/24/thomas-pikettys-capital-in-the-21st-century/ Let me sketch out that argument really briefly for you here. title: Pluralistic: America and "national capitalism" (18 Feb 2025)
